Subject: Domain Allowlist for CAP doesn't appear to be working
Description: We have a single allowlist containing the following URLs *.schemeswriter.co.uk https://*.schemeswriter.co.uk https://quotes.schemeswriter.co.uk We have added (ticked) this list in the Policy Allowlists > Deep Packet Inspection section of our only policy. We have updated our clients to use this new policy. When uploading a file to https://quotes.schemeswriter.co.uk/some/path we are still blocked from uploading it. We would like to allow a set of sub-domains dictated by https://*.schemeswriter.co.uk but this does not seem to work at all. What are we doing wrong?
What_We_Know__c: DPI allowlist does not work as expected.
Next_Steps__c: A remote session will be scheduled in order to further investigate.
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer asked to close the ticket for the moment as this is not something important for them.
They will reopen the ticket when if needed.
